Pengacara Bantah Balas Jasa Pilkada Terkait Kelola Parkir Ormas Bekasi
07 Nov 2019, 20:02 by Isal Mawardi
Bekasi - Surat tugas pengelolaan parkir oleh ormas yang dimandatkan oleh pihak Pemkot Bekasi menimbulkan polemik. Pengacara RM Purwadi membantah pengelolaan parkir yang dilakukan oleh ormas ada kaitan dengan balas jasa pada saat Pilkada lalu.
"Oh enggak, ini penertiban untuk parkir," ujar Purwadi usai mendampingi pemeriksaan Kepala Bapenda Bekasi Aan Suhanda di Polres Metro Bekasi Kota, Jalan Pramuka, Kota Bekasi, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Menurut Aan, surat tugas jaga parkir itu sudah ada sejak 2017 lalu. Surat tugas itu tidak 'dimandatkan' kepada ormas, melainkan kepada individu.
"(Dievaluasi) tiga bulan (sekali)," imbuhnya
Akan tetapi, khusus surat tugas yang menjadi kisruh, evaluasi dilakukan satu bulan setelah masa berlaku habis.

Lawyer Denies Repaying Pilkada Services Related to Managing Parking Ormas Bekasi
Nov 7 2019, 20:02 by Isal Mawardi
Bekasi - The letter of duty for parking management by mass organizations mandated by the Bekasi City Government has caused a polemic. Lawyer RM Purwadi denied that parking management carried out by CSOs had anything to do with service fees at the time of the last election.
"Oh no, this is an order for parking," Purwadi said after accompanying the examination of Bekasi Bapenda Chief Aan Suhanda at Bekasi City Metro Police, Jalan Pramuka, Bekasi City, Thursday (11/07/2019).
According to Aan, the parking guard duty has been around since 2017. The assignment letter was not 'mandated' to CSOs, but rather to individuals.
"(Evaluated) three months (once)," he added
However, specifically the assignment letter which became chaotic, the evaluation is carried out one month after the validity period expires.
